website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Get B Zee doesn’t have many reviews, but the few reviews that it has are generally positive. There are comments about the shoe’s durability and comfort. There is even one that talks about how it resembles its much more expensive counterparts, making it a really practical gift item.
pros: Some reviewers claim that the Under Armour Get B Zee is among the best UA shoes in the market today
One buyer loves that this shoe is very affordable
At least one user thinks that the upper is breathable enough to keep the foot dry
Like the Nike LeBron 16, some users say that the shoe is really designed in such a way that makes the shoe so easy to put on
A good number say that this shoe is comfortable
A buyer is amused that one of the colorways of the UA Get B Zee makes it look like the more expensive Curry shoes
A wearer loves that this shoe is able to last long
Buyers are also saying the same about the HOVR Havoc
cons: One reviewer does not like the design of the tongue
A wearer says that the strap on the ankle collar made the Under Armour Get B Zee look smaller than it really is

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe, even better performance
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and are perfect for casual wear, but I purchased them to play basketball. They are excellent on the court. Very comfortable, fit is perfect and the toe box is roomy without being too loose. It would be hard to find a better looking better performing shoe at this price. Definitely a home run for UA, if you need a good looking shoe to play in or just for comfortable casual wear I would definitely give these a shot!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Blister maker!
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected, but this is a blister maker!!! I played a pickup game of basketball, half court, and could feel the blister forming after a half-hour. I've never had a foot blister from playing basketball before these shoes... hence...blister maker!
customer_reviews.author: isaiah17_7

customer_reviews.title: Strong, solid, and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong with these as my daily sneaker. They have held up well in all kinds of conditions (even falling into a stream). I swear by Under Armour and of course recommend these! I assure you, I put my gear to the test! Although, ironically, I have done everything but play basketball in them LOL
customer_reviews.author: CityCitizen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable But Velcro Strap Small
customer_reviews.text: These run about a half size small. I wear a 10.5, so I ordered an 11, and they fit. My only complaint is the Velcro strap. It runs very small and needs more Velcro attached closer to the tongue, so the strap stays closed. The way it is now, it comes apart as soon as I stand up, or walk. I’m going to take them to a shoe repair shop and see if they can add Velcro to it. If not, I’ll either return these or slice off the straps.
customer_reviews.author: BFoosh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Loved so much I bought 2 pair. Will buy another pair when the other colors get a little cheaper. I usually wear a size 10.5 or 11 in sneakers and I sized up based on some of the reviews. I have VERY WIDE feet and these fit great. With that said, I do not wear these for basketball (I don't play basketball). I wear them because I'm a heavier guy and these provide excellent neutral support for my feet and ankles when I'm cross-training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fiend NJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Solid basketball shoe for your average player. The only thing to note from a potential fit issue, is that if you have a little bigger ankles, they may be a bit snug. I play soccer mostly, but got these to play in a church league, so they fit well as long as you don't wear a brace.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Parsons

customer_reviews.title: They are a nice show that I bought for my job when I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: They are a nice show that I bought for my job when I'm on my feet constantly and getting a pair of under armour shoes for 26 bucks you seriously can't beat that
customer_reviews.author: bradley jencks

customer_reviews.title: Quality questionable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes sole started separating less than 6 months after purchasing. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tlh

customer_reviews.title: ... for the first time today and it is very comfortable and provides good ankle support
customer_reviews.text: i have use this for the first time today and it is very comfortable and provides good ankle support. initially i found it a bit slippery but after a few minutes of running around on the court it turned out ok. the shoe feels solid and light so you dont feel weighed down. all in all great shoe. i would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Have the black pair and love them. The grey pair was must have! Great fit and look. Fast and efficient shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Task Watcther

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and a great deal on sale. These shoes feel cushion-y and supportive. I'd probably pay more for them but I got them for a great deal so I couldn't pass them up. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit great! My son loved them for basketball! ♡
customer_reviews.author: hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Rough on back of foot
customer_reviews.text: Tore up the back of my foot pretty good the first time. I like how they look, so I started wearing thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: ShahzebN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: thank you just what I wanted and delivery exact on time

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great quality and the size is as expected

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow near toes to be uncomfortable and cause injury. Not much ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great look, great fit. Now I just need to work on my jump shot.
customer_reviews.author: Jamee Good

customer_reviews.title: OK shoe... just OK
customer_reviews.text: Ok shoe, was looking for something a little bit better made. Got the black ones for $55. You get what you pay for. Ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: showed up dirty. they are white shoes and have dirt marks on both of them dont look new at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable shoe. Also
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable shoe. Also, the soles are shaped in a weird way that makes the ground feel uneven.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good support, played all day in these and was not sore at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I still got mine
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in 2017 and they are still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Antonio.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very light and very comfortable shoes. Design is very nice and material isn't flimsy it's good material. I got the all black ones so no stain issues and I'm completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Adame

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Grandson, age 14, loves them. Feels good and great support. Bought second pair.
customer_reviews.author: rowdy yates

customer_reviews.title: UA
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoes. I have a wide foot and they even fit me quite comfortable. The strap adds good ankle support
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These were used for my 9 year old basketball season. Good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It fits as expected and the quality is just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: states these are so comfortable and great ankle support
customer_reviews.text: My husband works on his feet all day, states these are so comfortable and great ankle support

customer_reviews.title: The shoe didn't fit. But the return process was a very easy.. I love that..
customer_reviews.text: It was the wrong size.. but you Exchange them and they are good now.. haven't really worn them I'm waiting for spring.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Vega

customer_reviews.title: Fitting is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good fit. My size is 11 and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sole started coming off on the 3rd week of wear

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: The velcro strap is a little short, but shoe is comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these about 12 times and now the strap has torn. Really!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and son loves them for basketball. Great ankle support

customer_reviews.title: However they have stretched enough now where they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a little tight right out of the box. However they have stretched enough now where they are comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: They're light weight stylish with good support and feel
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to play intramural basketball at school. They're light weight stylish with good support and feel. Great Christmas choice!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Shater

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, solid bball shoe and surprisingly wide foot which suits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shimerda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Styles not the best but affordable sneaker and nice feel to it and they’re light.

customer_reviews.title: ... symbol in shoe came off first day and was annoying rubbing agaisnt foot
customer_reviews.text: Under armour symbol in shoe came off first day and was annoying rubbing agaisnt foot.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: It is somewhat small it’s not the actual size the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is somewhat small it’s not the actual size the say it is, I have to give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Brown

customer_reviews.title: They suck
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with spots all over them. This is unacceptable. I demand a response.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Snow

customer_reviews.title: Stupid tongue design
customer_reviews.text: The tongue is oddly designed, so everytime I put these on, the tongue comes out of the shoe and I have to stuff it back in once my foot goes in. I bought this shoe because it seemed quick to wear but it turned out to be the opposite. Once the shoe is on it feels great, but its too much of a chore to live with.
customer_reviews.author: 35 rvct

customer_reviews.title: Stained defects, stay away
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of the shoes and the right shoe has yellow stains on it. Amazon gave me a free replacement and the replacement has the same issue. Replacement has the same color yellow stains but in smaller quantities. Terrible quality assurance if I get two defect shoes in a row. They fit perfectly stay away from the white pairs because of this stain issue
customer_reviews.author: Maliboostt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but the Velcro around the ankle made the shoe smaller
customer_reviews.author: shay

product_meta.title: Under Armour Get B Zee, Men’s Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: Upper in light and breathable fabric with leather side panels for more structure and stability The adjustable ankle collar adds support and elegance with the sculpted Under Armour logo Perforations on the entire upper increase breathability Retractable quick-lock lacing system The die-cut OrthoLite antimicrobial midsole is modeled on the shape of the foot The dual density insole uses Micro G foam along with the Charged Cushioning system under the heel to create an optimal combination of comfort and explosive energy Herringbone sole with rhombus-shaped inserts positioned strategically for greater control and grip Weight: 330 g
feature_bullets: The adjustable ankle collar adds support and elegance with the sculpted Under Armour logo
Perforations on the entire upper increase breathability
The die-cut OrthoLite antimicrobial midsole is modeled on the shape of the foot
Dual density insole uses Micro G foam along with the Charged Cushioning system create combination of comfort and explosive energy
